Text:
Where did you get this from ?
It's not available anywhere.
Did you do it yourself or what ?
Thanks.
No log, no cue, no artwork... mmm, I guess this is a fan-made compilation. I wonder who did the remaster and why :(
This is the official remaster released as part of the Genesis Live 1973-2007 boxset remixed by Nick Davis,have a look on Amazon if you don`t believe me.
Thank You Very Much for the Music!

Yes, zappa100 is right !

but log, cue, and artwork should be posted, too.

I have all GENESIS CD's collection,

but thank you anyway ! Great job !

I was looking for "The Way We Walk" in Amazon, that's why I didn't find it and wrote my previous comment.

I'm sorry, I found it as Genesis Live 1973 2007 and you're correct, it's part of an 8CD+3DVD boxset.

Since this is "Internet", every torrent with no log and/or no cue looks suspicious to me, I apologized once again.

http://www.amazon.com/Genesis-Live-1973-2007-CD-DVD/dp/B002GU5V24/ref=sr_1_2?ie=UTF8&s=music&qid=1266963019&sr=1-2

Thank you very kindly,
Gonzalo
No probs gonzalo,will include log + cue in future torrents
THANK YOU!!!! For all the genesis remasterd albums!!! I was wondering will you be uploading albums from the 1983-1998 box set???

If you searched "The Way We Walk" on Amazon after the upload date of 2/22/2010, you should have been able to find this.  It's made in Japan, so it's more expensive, but it's on Amazon and it's been there for almost a year now.
